// items Pager Indicators
Integrating the page control requires two steps. First, add a page control with companion scroll view, and second, forward the scroll view delegate methods to the page control.
Group chips
Chips allow users to enter information, make selections, filter content, or trigger actions. While buttons are expected to appear consistently and with familiar calls to action, chips should appear dynamically as a group of multiple interactive elements.
Loaders
Progress indicators inform users about the status of ongoing processes, such as loading an app, submitting a form, or saving updates. They communicate an appâ€™s state and indicate available actions, such as whether users can navigate away from the current screen.
